__TOC__

For the third month of the year 2013, the Ohio team is pleased to report that elections proceedings are now underway to restaff the High Council.  The High Council is a triumvirate normally.  Two seats will be filled by elections proceedings that will spill over into April.  Michael Gilbert will continue as a member of the High Council of Ubuntu Ohio.

This also brings us to the close of the first quarter of calendar year 2013.
